text: Xavi Quentin Shay Simons (born 21 April 2003) is a Dutch professional footballer who plays as an attacking midfielder or right winger for Bundesliga club RB Leipzig, on loan from Ligue 1 club Paris Saint-Germain, and the Netherlands national team. ==References== Category:2003 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Amsterdam Category:UEFA Euro 2024 players
title: Xavi Simons
